title: Impeachment Trial: An Annotated Look at Trump’s Speech Before the Capitol Riot
sub_head: Donald Trump’s Jan. 6 rally speech is at the center of the second impeachment trial against the former president. Read the speech with annotations on passages cited by the two sides.
body:
The experimental version of this article was created using automated speech-to-text technology to generate a first draft of the transcription. Editors then proofread and corrected the transcript, and annotated key sections with additional context and insights.
To enable interactivity between text and video, word-level time codes were aligned by programmatically comparing the accurate transcript with the automated one.
Credits
This is a newsroom innovation project
